text: KPDC-LP was a low-power television station in Indio, California that was broadcast on a local digital channel 25. KPDC was associated with Desert Chapel Ministries in Palm Springs, California. ==About== It was USA analog low-power and translator station. It was licensed to Desert Springs, Inc / Desert Broadcasting, Inc. The president of Desert Broadcasting was Fred Donaldson.FCCInfo.com Cavell, Mertz & Associates, Inc.
